Mapping Providers

Andrew Bruce

2023-11-16

Source: vignettes/articles/geospatial.Rmd
geospatial.Rmd

Load Packages 

library(provider)
library(tidygeocoder)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggsflabel)
library(ggrepel)
library(tigris)


Retrieve Addresses of all RHCs in Georgia 

rhcs <- providers(state = "GA", specialty_code = "00-17") |> 
  dplyr::distinct(npi) |> 
  dplyr::pull(npi) |> 
  purrr::map(\(x) nppes(npi = x)) |>
  purrr::list_rbind() |> 
  dplyr::select(npi,
                organization, 
                tx_desc,
                org_part,
                purpose,
                org_parent,
                on_type,
                on_org_name,
                address, 
                city, 
                state, 
                zip,
                pr_purpose, 
                pr_address, 
                pr_city, 
                pr_state, 
                pr_zip)


Stack Distinct LOCATION & PRACTICE Addresses 

rhcs <- dplyr::bind_rows(
  dplyr::select(rhcs, 
                npi,
                organization, 
                tx_desc,
                org_part,
                purpose,
                org_parent,
                on_type,
                on_org_name,
                address, 
                city, 
                state, 
                zip),
  dplyr::select(rhcs, 
                npi, 
                organization, 
                tx_desc,
                org_part,
                purpose = pr_purpose, 
                org_parent,
                on_type,
                on_org_name,
                address = pr_address, 
                city = pr_city, 
                state = pr_state, 
                zip = pr_zip)) |> 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(purpose)) |> 
  tidyr::nest(specialty = tx_desc, 
              other_names = c(org_parent, 
                              on_type, 
                              on_org_name)) |> 
  add_counties(city, state, zip, add_sf = TRUE) |> 
  tidyr::unite("address", 
               address:state, 
               remove = TRUE, 
               sep = " ")
#> Error in `dplyr::mutate()`:
#> ℹ In argument: `.county_fips = purrr::map2_chr(df$lng, df$lat,
#>   fipio::coords_to_fips)`.
#> Caused by error in `purrr::map2_chr()`:
#> ℹ In index: 34.
#> Caused by error:
#> ! Result must be length 1, not 0.


Filter to distinct counties for labelling 

county_pts <- dplyr::distinct(rhcs, county, .keep_all = TRUE) |> 
  dplyr::select(county, lat, lng) |> 
  dplyr::filter(county != "Duval")
#> Error in `dplyr::distinct()`:
#> ! Must use existing variables.
#> ✖ `county` not found in `.data`.


Geocode with {tidygeocoder} 

rhc_geo <- dplyr::select(rhcs, npi:zip) |> 
  dplyr::filter(zip != "32209") |> 
  tidygeocoder::geocode(address      = address, 
                        method       = "mapbox", 
                        full_results = TRUE, 
                        unique_only  = FALSE, 
                        return_input = TRUE) |> 
  dplyr::select(npi, zip, place_name, lat, long)


Retrieve Georgia counties shapefile from {tigris} 

ga_counties <- tigris::counties(state = "GA", year = 2022, progress_bar = FALSE)


Map with {ggplot} 

p <- ggplot2::ggplot() + 
  ggplot2::geom_sf(data = ga_counties, 
                   fill = "grey80", 
                   colour = "white") +
  ggrepel::geom_label_repel(county_pts,
                  mapping = aes(lng, 
                                lat, 
                                label = county),
                  colour = "grey30",
                  fill = "white",
                  alpha = 0.85,
                  force_pull = 0,
                  segment.curvature = -0.1,
                  segment.ncp = 3,
                  segment.angle = 10,
                  min.segment.length = 0,
                  label.size = 0) +
  ggplot2::geom_point(rhc_geo, 
                      mapping = ggplot2::aes(long, lat), 
                      fill = "orange", 
                      color = "darkred", 
                      alpha = 0.75, 
                      size = 2.75, 
                      shape = 21, 
                      stroke = 0.75) +
  ggplot2::theme_void()
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'county_pts' not found
p + ggsflabel::lims_bbox(ga_counties)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'p' not found
